subject: Re: [junit] No assertEquals(double, double)?
msgSnippet: ... I haven t tested it right now, but shouldn t assertEquals( check -0 and +0 , new Double(-0d), new Double(0d)); do the trick? Regards, Lothar -- Lothar
messageBody:
On Sun, 12 May 2002 01:17:47 +0300, Alexander Zynevich wrote:

>for example max(-0.0,+0.0) should return +0.0 if I test my own realizaton of
>max I will want to distinguish them :)

I haven't tested it right now, but shouldn't

assertEquals("check -0 and +0", new Double(-0d), new Double(0d));

do the trick?


Regards, Lothar

--
Lothar Kimmeringer E-Mail: lothar@...
PGP-encrypted mails preferred (Key-ID: 0x8BC3CD81)

Always remember: The answer is forty-two, there can only be wrong
questions!
